00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup WDT_Examples WDT
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Period_Reload
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void SysTick_Configuration(void);
00046 void WDT_Configuration(void);
00047 
00048 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00050   * @brief  Main program.
00051   * @retval None
00052   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00053 int main(void)
00054 {
00055   /* Initialize LEDs                                                                                        */
00056   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00057   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00058 
00059   SysTick_Configuration();
00060 
00061   WDT_Configuration();
00062   
00063   while (1)
00064   {
00065     /*A Watchdog timer underflow has occurred                                                               */
00066     if (WDT_GetFlagStatus(WDT_FLAG_UNDERFLOW))
00067     {
00068       SYSTICK_IntConfig(DISABLE);                    // Disable SysTick Interrupt
00069       HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00070       HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00071       while (1);
00072     }
00073     /*A Watchdog timer error has occurred                                                                  */
00074     else if (WDT_GetFlagStatus(WDT_FLAG_ERROR))
00075     {
00076       SYSTICK_IntConfig(DISABLE);                    // Disable SysTick Interrupt
00077       HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00078       HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00079       while (1);
00080     }
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00085   * @brief  Configure the Systick
00086   * @retval None
00087   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00088 void SysTick_Configuration(void)
00089 {
00090   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK);         // Default: CK_AHB/8 on chip
00091   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(SystemCoreClock / 8 / 10);     // 1/10 Hz = 100ms
00092   SYSTICK_IntConfig(ENABLE);                            // Enable SysTick Interrupt
00093   /* Enable SYSTICK Counter                                                                                 */
00094   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);          // Clear Initial Counter
00095   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);         // Enable Systick Counter
00096 }
00097 
00098 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00099   * @brief  Configure the Watchdog
00100   * @retval None
00101   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00102 void WDT_Configuration(void)
00103 {
00104   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00105   CKCUClock.Bit.WDT = 1;
00106   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00107 
00108   /* Enable WDT APB clock                                                                                   */
00109   /* Reset WDT                                                                                              */
00110   WDT_DeInit();
00111   /* Set Prescaler Value, 32K/64 = 500 Hz                                                                   */
00112   WDT_SetPrescaler(WDT_PRESCALER_64);
00113   /* Set Prescaler Value, 500 Hz/4000 = 0.125 Hz                                                            */
00114   WDT_SetReloadValue(4000);
00115   /* Set Delta Value, 500 Hz/4000 = 0.125 Hz                                                                */
00116   WDT_SetDeltaValue(4000);
00117   WDT_Restart();                    // Reload Counter as WDTV Value
00118   #if 0
00119   WDT_ResetCmd(ENABLE);             // Enable the WDT Reset when WDT meets underflow or error.
00120   #endif
00121   WDT_Cmd(ENABLE);                  // Enable WDT
00122   WDT_ProtectCmd(ENABLE);           // Enable WDT Protection
00123 }
00124 
00125 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00132 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00135      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00136      Debug message can be added here.
00137      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00138   */
00139 
00140   while (1)
00141   {
00142   }
00143 }
00144 #endif
